sig_info: At the start of the fight, begin Phasing for 2 seconds.
When opponents Miss, generate 2.06 to 5% of Max Power per Miss.

DASH BACK: Begin Phasing for 2 seconds. Phasing won’t activate if Ghost is afflicted with an Armor Break Debuff or has a Precision Passive.
PHASING: While Phasing, incoming attacks have a 100% chance to Miss and each Damage Over Time Debuff on Ghost converts to a Fury Passive increasing Attack Rating by 93 for 5 seconds.
Psychic attacks will not Miss Ghost, even while she is Phased.
Upon Phasing, gain a Precision Passive for 6 seconds which guarantees the next hit to be Critical and consumes the Precision Passive. Ghost can only land Critical Hits through her abilities.
While this Precision is active, Opponents cannot trigger their Evade abilities.
Phasing is immediately deactivated when Ghost initiates an attack or Blocks an attack.
ALL ATTACKS: Non-Critical Hits have a 10% chance to gain a Cruelty Buff increasing Critical Damage Rating by 1066.67 for 20 seconds. Cruelty Buffs stack up to 5.
When the opponent Evades, gain a Precision Passive for 6 seconds.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 50% chance to gain a Fury Buff for 10 seconds, granting +46.5 Attack.
The chance to gain a Cruelty Buff on a Heavy Non-Critical Hit increases the longer the Heavy Attack is charged.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Gain 3 Precision Passives for 6 seconds.
When triggered immediately upon Phasing, each hit is a guaranteed Critical, and Opponents cannot trigger their Evade abilities.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Gain a Cruelty Buff increasing Critical Damage Rating by 1066.67 for 20 seconds, then refresh all Cruelty Buffs generated by Ghost.
When triggered immediately upon Phasing, each hit is a guaranteed Critical, and Opponents cannot trigger their Evade abilities.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Each Cruelty Buff generated by Ghost converts to a permanent Cruelty Passive. Cruelty Passives stack up to 5.

sig_info: At the start of the fight, begin Phasing for 2 seconds.
When opponents Miss, generate 2.02 to 5% of Max Power per Miss.

DASH BACK: Begin Phasing for 2 seconds. Phasing won’t activate if Ghost is afflicted with an Armor Break Debuff or has a Precision Passive.
PHASING: While Phasing, incoming attacks have a 100% chance to Miss and each Damage Over Time Debuff on Ghost converts to a Fury Passive increasing Attack Rating by 2040 for 5 seconds.
Psychic attacks will not Miss Ghost, even while she is Phased.
Upon Phasing, gain a Precision Passive for 6 seconds which guarantees the next hit to be Critical and consumes the Precision Passive. Ghost can only land Critical Hits through her abilities.
While this Precision is active, Opponents cannot trigger their Evade abilities.
Phasing is immediately deactivated when Ghost initiates an attack or Blocks an attack.
ALL ATTACKS: Non-Critical Hits have a 10% chance to gain a Cruelty Buff increasing Critical Damage Rating by 1366.67 for 20 seconds. Cruelty Buffs stack up to 5.

HEAVY ATTACKS: 50% chance to gain a Fury Buff for 10 seconds, granting +1020 Attack.
The chance to gain a Cruelty Buff on a Heavy Non-Critical Hit increases the longer the Heavy Attack is charged.
